issue.title: ROS: Can't start gazebo. Offscreen rendering problem

content.raw:
OK, I compiled the source and:

* the server started without problems
* in another terminal, the client started and crashed immediately. With the gdb, gazebo window appeared and didn't crash except after clicking.
* Attached is the backtrace for the client terminal.

Side notes:

* Following the compile instructions, i apt-get the prerequisites, which resulted in:

The following NEW packages will be installed:
  libogre-1.7.4 libogre-dev libprotobuf-dev libprotobuf-lite7 libprotoc-dev
  libtar-dev

* Also, i noticed this warning in cmake:

BUILD WARNINGS
-- 	CEGUI not found, opengl GUI will be disabled.
-- 	Player not found, gazebo plugin for player will not be built.
-- END BUILD WARNINGS

Thanks
content.html:
OK, I compiled the source and:

  • the server started without problems
  • in another terminal, the client started and crashed immediately. With the gdb, gazebo window appeared and didn't crash except after clicking.
  • Attached is the backtrace for the client terminal.

Side notes:

  • Following the compile instructions, i apt-get the prerequisites, which resulted in:

The following NEW packages will be installed: libogre-1.7.4 libogre-dev libprotobuf-dev libprotobuf-lite7 libprotoc-dev libtar-dev

  • Also, i noticed this warning in cmake:

BUILD WARNINGS -- CEGUI not found, opengl GUI will be disabled. -- Player not found, gazebo plugin for player will not be built. -- END BUILD WARNINGS

Thanks
